Topic.Title: The publisher of the News Journal who lists the Gun Owners Names & Addresses is

Message.Msg: I think the addresses of all the anti-Constitutionalists should be circulated. These lefties are all totalitarians that want to rule a slave state. We need to let them know it ain't gonna happen.
